entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: NotifyCollectionChangedAction for item updated / item property changed #79713
  • [Mono] Unloadable ALCs. #79711
  • .NET 7 AOT x86/x64 Unable to build a method of a generic class that returns Type #79710
  • The certificate data cannot be read with the provided password, the password may be incorrect - When a docker container is set to automatically restart or manually restarted #79707
  • [.NET 6/7] An alternative to Mono.Runtime.RemoveSignalHandlers/InstallSignalHandlers in .NET 6/7? #79706
  • LibraryImportGenerator should generate a souce that calls statefull-marshaller-with-caller-allocated-buffer's FromManaged for ref parameter #79702
  • missleading error net_io_invalidasyncresult #79700
  • [API Proposal]: enum PARSE attribute #79699
  • ZipArchive disposes passed stream twice #79695
  • Install-Package: Dependency loop detected for package 'System.Text.Encoding.CodePages'. #79688
  • [API Proposal]: Add SslStream.IsServerAlpnSupported #79687

Closed

  • [NativeAOT] Crash with access violation instead of throwing System.NullReferenceException #79494
  • ThrowIfNull and ThrowIfNullOrEmpty could return a value #79691
  • Assertion failed '((tree->gtDebugFlags & GTF_DEBUG_NODE_MORPHED) == 0) && "ERROR: Already morphed this node!"' during 'Morph - Global' #79543
    8.0.0
  • Backward binary compatibility #79650
  • [NativeAOT] ConcurrentDictionary is slower #68891
    Future
  • [NativeAOT] Implement thin locks #75108
    8.0.0
  • It should be clearer why Guid.NewGuid fails in a .NET 7 wasmconsole (because crypto is not present in NodeJS by default) #79683
  • System.Net.Sockets.Tests crashing in CI with Assertion failed: (numEvents != 0) #36466
    Future
  • Socket.BeginSendFile throws SocketException "The parameter is incorrect" when sending large files #41834
    Future
  • Test failure in CI System.Net.Sockets.Tests.OSSupportTest.IOControl_SIOCATMARK_Unix_Success #37181
    Future
  • Test failure: System.Net.Sockets.Tests.DnsEndPointTest.Socket_ConnectAsyncDnsEndPoint_Success(type: Async) #36737
    Future
  • Performance regressions on EF scenarios #36292
    Future
  • Blazor WASM / Browser WASM format as currency shows "AUD" instead of "$" #45262
    8.0.0
  • JIT: Value-numbering is over-conservative for image_rel32 statics #6552
    Future
  • Use a custom calling convention if necessary for math intrinsics that were previously x87 instructions. #6623
    Future
  • Proposal: Introducing a JIT intrinsic for acquiring timestamps #6956
    Future
  • 关于 HttpClient.PostAsync 使用JsonContent 时的问题 #79663
  • RyuJIT: Allow promotions of structs with fields of struct containing a single primitive field. #7441
    Future
  • [x86/Linux] Enable FEATURE_FIXED_OUT_ARGS #7574
    Future
  • RyuJIT: tail call stress assert in importer on Linux #7586
    Future
  • [x86/Linux] Call with an struct argument having long member #7674
    Future
  • System.Text.Json Source Generator System.NotSupported exception for IEnumerable Implementations #79661
  • [Jit] Loop condition doesn't elide bounds check #9422
    Future
  • Records class can not get property's CustomAttribute #79692
  • Add and EventSource test that test for a large number of events #6020
    Future
  • If I use more than 8 parameters value types values are setting to false or 0 #78170
  • SyndicationFeed_Write_RSS_Atom test failing with "IOException : The file '/tmp/' already exists." #78454
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Type.HasDefaultConstructor method #75362
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve spmi diffs summary report #79725
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Refactoring store liveness update #79724
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Take advantage of simplifications enabled by folding all indirect access to locals #79722
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Introduce designated direct pinvokes to mono aot compiler #79721
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Move remaining HIR SIMDIntrinsics to SimdAsHWIntrinsic #79720
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Improve SIMD vector equality operator #79719
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • improve SendFileGetsCanceledByDispose test #79718
    area-System.Net.Sockets, test-enhancement, 8.0.0
  • Look up Queryable operator MethodInfos without MakeGenericMethod #79717
    area-System.Linq
  • [mono] Reuse handles inside a loop in reflection_create_dynamic_metho… #79716
    area-System.Reflection-mono
  • NativeAOT: avoid helper calls for static fields #79709
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix deviating XMLDoc for HostingEnvExtensions #79708
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • Fix failing coreclr tests in `runincontext` mode #79705
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Fix WXORX issue in EEClass::Destruct #79703
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • Prefer interpreted execution for AsQueryable #79698
    area-System.Linq.Expressions
  • More preparation for JIT\Regression test merging #79697
    test-enhancement, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [JIT] EXPERIMENT - Narrow tree lowering #79690
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Delete MetadataType from the runtime type system #79693
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Refactor gtExtractSideEffList and fix GTF_DEBUG_NODE_MORPHED propagation #79611
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Thin locks #79519
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Stop producing and handling `ADDR` nodes #78246
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve "one asg morphing" and move it to `morphblock.cpp` #79037
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Be more precise about choosing what to DNER in block morphing #77980
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Disallow `IND<struct>` except as a source of `STORE_DYN_BLK` #74784
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [iOS][tvOS] Skip NullableTests.ClassWithDictionariesWithNullableValues #79675
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [wasm] fix aotProfiler init #79651
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Initial support for unloadable ALCs #77399
    area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • Fix WXORX issue in EEClass::Destruct #79696
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix perf. regression caused by signed/unsigned comp #79137
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [wasm] WasmDebugLevel in samples #79644
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Do not generate cctor info on generic definition `MethodTable` #79689
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] dotnet-runtime-perf: Fix V8 version to 11.0.162 #79682
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, perf-pipeline
  • Remove some dead code from the legacy SIMD support #79680
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable loop alignment during asmdiffs #79629
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ifdef out unsupported Enum underlying types for nativeaot #79472

Updated

  • SP800-108 CTR HMAC #79120
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix the multicore performance of mapping from an instruction pointer to a MethodDesc #79021
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fixes #79558 #79681
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Double IndexOf throughput for chars #78861
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Fix HTTP3 header decoder buffer allocation #78862
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Replace successive "ldr" and "str" instructions with "ldp" and "stp" #77540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove RequiresDynamicCode from Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection #79425
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • JIT: experiment with early liveness and use it for forward sub and last-use copy elision #79346
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix ConnectAsync with buffer on Windows #79669
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Ensure that OptionsCache only permits creating a single options instance per name #79639
    area-Extensions-Options, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Remaining feedback from ILLink merge #79677
    area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • Split TryRead implementation into TryPopulate and TryCreateObject #79659
    area-System.Text.Json
  • JIT: Allow sharing call temps within statements #79574
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Cleanup unmaintainable parallel logic with workers #77993
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, community-contribution
  • Re-Enable SendRecvPollSync_TcpListener_Socket Test #79145
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • [mono][interp] Allow passing vtypes with a single scalar field to nat… #79686
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Add nullable reference type annotations to System.Text.Json source gen #79613
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Ensure that `TryGetContainableHWIntrinsicOp` is non-mutating #79363
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][aot] Optimize constrained calls made from gsharedvt methods. #79339
  • [draft][wasm] Memory snapshot #78915
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Allow Base64Decoder to ignore space chars, add IsValid methods and tests #79334
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add version info to NativeAOT Unix apps #79623
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Produce crashreport.json and use llvm-symbolizer to create stack trace #77578
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [iOS] Run more tests on the rolling build #79678
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Enable AVX512 Additional 16 SIMD Registers #79544
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action, arch-avx512
